member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.Find(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calls and returns data from the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.FindScalar(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Executes a an sql query that returns an integer as a result.
An example would be using the MAX function to get the last instance id.
member.returns: Returns an Integer. If no result can be found, a 0 is returned.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.Update(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates data using the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes data using the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.Create(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates data using the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.ProcessTransaction(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Processes multiple transactions based on the array passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataAccessWS.GetConnString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the Connection string used to access the database. based on the ConnectID passed in.

member.name: M:AccessService.DataException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructer used to create an instance of a DataException. All parameters must be passed.

member.name: P:AccessService.DataException.sql
member.summary: Gets the sql statement that was attempted when the exception occurred.
